name: Neon Shadows
description: A neon polygons game This game was made during the "Mini Jam 86 : Sports." The optional theme was "Sports" and the limitation was "No stopping". Neon Shadows In this stealth game you will have to sneak around your enemies to reach the end of every level. However, you must always keep on the move, as your own shadow will try to kill you by copying your every move with a single second of delay.  Bugs There are problems with rendering on some PC configurations (Laptops seems to have these bugs). It will cause graphic issues, but the game stays fully playable.  Also playing the game through the Itch.io desktop app seems to remove the music for some reason.
